languages.text: Провидец Эклендиль Маэрш, заточенный гемункулом в сердце одного из шпилей Комморры, поведал Ирлиэт горькую истину о падении ее родного дома, мира-корабля Крудараха.
The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.
languages.original_text: Провидец Эклендиль Маэрш, заточенный гемункулом в сердце одного из шпилей Комморры, поведал Ирлиэт горькую истину о падении ее родного дома, мира-корабля Крудараха.

traits.locale_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.
The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

languages.text: 先知埃克伦迪·玛厄什被血伶人囚禁在了科摩罗的尖塔之中。他重获自由之后，告诉了伊莉耶特关于方舟世界克鲁达拉赫陨落的痛苦真相。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

traits.locale_text: 先知埃克伦迪·玛厄什被血伶人囚禁在了科摩罗的尖塔之中。他重获自由之后，告诉了伊莉耶特关于方舟世界克鲁达拉赫陨落的痛苦真相。

languages.text: Der Runenprophet Eklendyl Ma'ersh, vom Haemonculus in einem der Türme von Commorragh eingesperrt, hat Yrliet die bittere Wahrheit über den Niedergang ihrer Heimat berichtet, des Weltenschiffs Crudarach.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

traits.locale_text: Der Runenprophet Eklendyl Ma'ersh, vom Haemonculus in einem der Türme von Commorragh eingesperrt, hat Yrliet die bittere Wahrheit über den Niedergang ihrer Heimat berichtet, des Weltenschiffs Crudarach.

languages.text: Le Grand Prophète Eklendyl Ma'ersh, retenu captif par l'hémoncule au cœur de l'une des tours de Commorragh, a révélé à Yrliet la triste vérité concernant la destruction de son foyer, le vaisseau-monde Crudarach.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

traits.locale_text: Le Grand Prophète Eklendyl Ma'ersh, retenu captif par l'hémoncule au cœur de l'une des tours de Commorragh, a révélé à Yrliet la triste vérité concernant la destruction de son foyer, le vaisseau-monde Crudarach.

languages.text: El vidente Eklendyl Ma'ersh, a quien el Hemónculo había encerrado en el corazón de una de las torres de Commorragh, le ha contado a Yrliet la amarga verdad sobre la caída de su hogar, el mundo astronave Crudarach.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

traits.locale_text: El vidente Eklendyl Ma'ersh, a quien el Hemónculo había encerrado en el corazón de una de las torres de Commorragh, le ha contado a Yrliet la amarga verdad sobre la caída de su hogar, el mundo astronave de Crudarach.

languages.text: ハモンキュラスによってコモラフの尖塔の中心部に幽閉されていた先見司エクレンディル・マエルシュは、故郷である方舟のクルダラの滅亡に関する苦い真実をユリエットに語った。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.

traits.locale_text: ハモンキュラスによってコモラフの尖塔の中心部に幽閉されていた先見司エクレンディル・マエルシュは、故郷である方舟のクルダラの滅亡に関する苦い真実をユリエットに語った。

languages.text: Haimonkulus tarafından Commorragh kulelerinden birinin göbeğinde hapsedilmiş olan Ötesezen Eklendyl Ma'ersh, Yrliet'e yuvası gemidünya Crudarach'ın düşüşü hakkındaki acı gerçeği açıkladı.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who was imprisoned in the heart of one of Commorragh's spires by the Haemonculus, told Yrliet the bitter truth about the fall of her home, the craftworld Crudarach.
